description: 499 OTHER PROFESSIONAL SERVICES NOT ELSEWHERE SPECIFIED
extraDescription: Three Disability Benefits Consultants for the Disability and Sick Leave Management (DSLM) Transformation Project in the Federal Public Service.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.This contract is a multi-year contract.
